channel.title: Cannonballer
channel.description:
Buying steel bars, making them into cannonballs, and reselling them is an excellent business. Can anyone make a script that takes steel bars from bank, and then makes them into cannonballs?
the best place to do it is in Al Kharid. Furnace and bank are really close together
